summary:
What I do: Enhancing communication, stories, and impact for international organisations.

Who I am: My name is Reinier van Oorsouw, specializing in pioneering media solutions tailored exactly to clients' needs. Creative ideas, high-quality products, and effective exposure. 

Drop me a line via: reinier@beyondbordersmedia.com 
See more via: www.beyondbordersmedia.com
treasury_media: [{'url': 'https://beyondbordersmedia.com/portfolios/african-development-bank-north-and-west-africa/', 'title': 'African Development Bank – North & West Africa', 'description': 'African Development Bank (AfDB) spurs sustainable economic development and social progress in its member countries in Africa, thus contributing to poverty reduction. AfDB funds may projects to help achieve its mission. BBM is tasked with showcasing them, in videography, photography and written stories. In Mauritania, Senegal, Morocco, Tunisia & Egypt we have created engaging content, which is used for various communication goals, like lobby, donor justification, informing general audiences.', 'image': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/sync/D4E27AQEMIQwbf-9gAg/articleshare-shrink_1280_800/0/1691157643960?e=1692946800&v=beta&t=hZY2rV1zfvvxI0vBpJPrAZkxqQsD-eFMZBpGXRHOJ_o'}, {'url': 'https://beyondbordersmedia.com/portfolios/unhcr-mali/', 'title': 'UNHCR Mali, Mauritania & Burkina Faso - Malian Refugee Crisis', 'description': 'The Malian refugee crisis has been displacing people for years. UNHCR therefore re-approached this crisis to find long-term solutions to improve the livelihoods of refugees, helping them to develop their skills in order to find work. BBM visited their projects in Mali, Burkina Faso & Mauritania to create video, photo and text stories on their activities.', 'image': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/sync/C4E27AQG5tFjresqZvQ/articleshare-shrink_800/0/1691936219589?e=1692946800&v=beta&t=4WWNmwyKhE9iVVZZdE7nHl-FGZ_-GAkaJOSiTnc91dI'}, {'url': 'https://beyondbordersmedia.com/portfolios/unops-iwrm/', 'title': 'UNOPS - Water Management in Small Island States', 'description': 'Small islands have a small supply of fresh water, hence they have to be careful with what they have. With growing populations and increased climate change effects, small islands are on the frontline of a disaster; becoming inhabitable. BBM visited six island states (Sao Tome, Cape Verde, Maldives, Seychelles, Comoros & Mauritius) to create case videos, photography and an overall thought piece for UNOPS in their support to island states.', 'image': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/sync/C4E27AQEHUSgLioLSFg/articleshare-shrink_1280_800/0/1691936219712?e=1692946800&v=beta&t=v1DRC_-sOmyxedEjdNa9f-e-YhILk8tYfO0vJpXX5o8'}, {'url': 'https://beyondbordersmedia.com/portfolios/solidaridad-tvc/', 'title': 'Solidaridad - TV & Radio Commercial + Brandmovie', 'description': 'Sustainable consumption is the way forward for our society. One of the driving forces behind this concept is Solidaridad, promoting sustainability & better working conditions in various sectors around the globe. BBM was invited to design their new brandmovie & TV + Radio Commercial.', 'image': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/sync/C4E27AQEv27ACdeu_9w/articleshare-shrink_1280_800/0/1691936219488?e=1692946800&v=beta&t=SuELfUt2qdQtP6zSrpICEWV_SUkG3CGeeeWSzEwUdBA'}, {'url': 'https://beyondbordersmedia.com/portfolios/unicef-everychildalive/', 'title': 'Maternal Health Campaign - Nigeria, Pakistan, Tanzania & Nepal - with UNICEF', 'description': "Beyond Borders Media produced UNICEF's #EveryChildAlive campaign, which focuses on the importance of the health of new-born babies in the first month of their lives. To reduce child mortality, UNICEF provides 'easy-to-implement' solution for development countries.", 'image': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/sync/C4E27AQFDSiXGT-MrGA/articleshare-shrink_1280_800/0/1691936219574?e=1692946800&v=beta&t=xeoG9V0uFK4SVZ2yHi8aPBliskMJcZcVLq9i3gS_VPU'}]

A modern day powerhouse for content and exposure, aiding the branches of travel & adventure and aid & development. As a cross-media agency, BBM focuses on campaigns over multiple types of media, producing video, photography, social media and online campaigns, storytelling, web development etc... 

At BBM, I´m responsible for the following tasks:
. Developing and Delivering Campaigns
. Clients' media optimalization and achieving audience growth
. Managing & Producing Campaigns
. Supervision Staff & Freelancers
. Booking Shoots
. Contact with clients

Clients of BBM include: 
UNICEF, UNHCR, WHO, UNODC, USAID, IOM, UNDP, SNV, Simavi, UNFPA, Canon, Al-Jazeera and many more. 

Contact me via: reinier@beyondbordersmedia.com
